Password must contain at least one symbol

"Unable to Change SIM Lock. SIM doesn't support it."
SD card and phone storage settings
Unmount SD card. View available storage
Unmount SD card for safe removal
Unmounting SD card will stop some applications from functioning. Applications may not be available until SD card mounted
Unable to unmount SD card. Try later
SD card will be unmounted. Check notification area for status
The Name field cannot be empty
MNC field must be 2 or 3 digits.

"All data will be erased from device memory, including your Google account, system and application data, settings, and downloaded applications.
To also erase music, pictures, and other user data, the SD card needs to be formatted"
"Erases all data on device's SD card, such as music and photos"
Resetting phone will delete all personal information and any downloaded applications. Data cannot be recovered. Continue?
You must draw your unlock pattern to confirm phone reset
No reset was performed because the System Clear service is not available.
Erases all data on the SD card
This action will erase the SD card in the phone. You will lose ALL data on the card!
Format SD card, erasing all your media? Action cannot be reversed!
Draw your unlock pattern to confirm SD card format
Set up voice mail, call forwarding, call waiting, caller ID
"Share your phone's mobile data connection via USB"
"Share your phone's mobile data connection as a portable Wi-Fi hotspot"
"Share your phone's mobile data connection via USB or as a portable Wi-Fi hotspot"

Set options for roaming, networks, APNs
See location in applications (such as Maps) using wireless networks
Location determined by Wi-Fi and/or mobile networks
When locating, accurate to street level (deselect to conserve battery)
Locate to street-level (requires more battery plus view of sky)
Use server to assist GPS (Untick to reduce network usage)
Use server to assist GPS (Tick to improve GPS performance)
View legal info, phone status, software version
Learn how to use your phone
There is a problem loading the licences
Your phone is not connected to data service. To view this information, go to %s from any computer with Internet access
Connect at least %d dots. Try again:
Must draw pattern to unlock screen
How to draw an unlock pattern

"Protect your phone from unauthorised use by creating a personal screen unlock pattern. "" "1" On the next screen, watch while an example pattern is drawn. "" "2" When ready, draw your own personal unlock pattern. Experiment with different patterns but connect at least four dots. "" "3" Redraw your pattern to confirm. "" "Ready to start? Select “Next”". "" "To leave your phone unprotected, select “Cancel”." "
Connect at least four dots. Select Next when you’re ready to draw your own pattern
Manage applications, set up quick launch shortcuts

Your phone and personal data are more vulnerable to attack by applications from unknown sources. You agree that you are solely responsible for any damage to your phone or loss of data that may result from using these applications
You have selected to launch this application by default for some actions
"All of this application's data will be deleted, including all files, settings, accounts, databases, etc."
The application was not found in the list of installed applications.
Uninstall all updates from Android system applications?
This application can access the following on your phone:
System updates cannot be installed on external memory
This application will restart now. Continue?
Change preferred location for new applications
View and control currently running services
Started by application: Tap to stop
Service started by application. Stopping service may cause application to fail
Stopping application may lose some of your current work
Old application process kept for better speed in case it is needed again. There is usually no reason to stop it
%1$s in use. Tap Settings to manage it
Stop this system service? Some features of your phone may stop working correctly until you turn it off and then on again
Press Space key twice to insert
This input method from %s application may collect all the text you type, including passwords, credit card numbers, and other personal data. Continue?
You do not have any words in the user dictionary. You can add a word through the menu
Set keyboard shortcuts to launch applications
Your shortcut for %1$s (%2$s) will be cleared.
Debug mode when USB is connected
Screen will never sleep while charging
USB debugging is intended for development purposes only. It can be used to copy data between your computer and your device, install applications on your device without notification, and read log data

This accessibility service from %s application may collect all the text you type, except passwords, including personal data, credit card numbers, and other personal data. It may also log your user interface interactions. Continue?
You do not have any accessibility applications. You can download a screen reader from Android Market. Click OK to install screen reader
Press the power key to end calls when screen is on. This will not turn off screen
